meanings.definition: A series of loud, clear, musical tones.
meanings.sent1: The concert hall was filled with the beautiful rangs of the orchestra.
meanings.sent2: I heard the sweet rangs of the piano as I walked by the music room.
meanings.sent3: The chirping birds seemed to join in the rangs of the wind chimes on the porch.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like joyful rangs of a bell.
meanings.sent5: The distant rangs of the church bells signaled the start of the ceremony.

meanings.definition: To make a loud, clear, musical sound.
meanings.sent1: She rangs the bell to announce the end of the school day.
meanings.sent2: The wind chimes rangs softly in the breeze outside.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally rangs the doorbell with its tail.
meanings.sent4: His voice rangs out across the field, calling for everyone to gather.
meanings.sent5: The alarm clock rangs loudly, waking me up from my deep sleep.

meanings.definition: A range or extent of something.
meanings.sent1: The vast rangs of the desert stretched out before us.
meanings.sent2: She explored the full rangs of emotions during the play.
meanings.sent3: The menu offered a wide rangs of delicious dishes to choose from.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge covered a broad rangs of topics, from history to science.
meanings.sent5: The artist used a colorful rangs of paints to create a masterpiece.
